mapper.insert: insert into like_property_tbl (member_no, property_no) values((select member_no from member_tbl where member_id = #{userId}), #{proNo})
mapper.select: select * from property_tbl pr where pr.property_no in ( select property_no from like_property_tbl where member_no = ( select member_no from member_tbl where member_id = #{userId})) order by like_property_no asc
